title: 12/23: Weekend Recap - Fantasy Champions! (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Hopefully your Fantasy Super Bowl went well and you are celebrating this week. We'll recap everything including C.J. Anderson's ridiculous day (2:30), the NFL playoff picture and how it impacts Week 17, the big news (6:24) and what surprised us in Week 16 (8:00) including Nick Foles and Brian Hill ... MegaDuds (12:32) headlined by a couple of Patriots and Philip Rivers, plus Week 16 leaders at each position (20:00). Our thoughts on Chris Herndon vs. David Njoku, Baker Mayfield next year, the MIN WRs and their lack of production, Sony Michel and more ... Recapping every game with our Fantasy thoughts (33:55) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Recapping a fun Week 16 and hopefully celebrating some championships! How about Nick Foles and C.J. Anderson! What happened to Amari Cooper and Tom Brady?
